## ElementController.forCustomElement() method

Locates or creates a controller for the specified element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static forCustomElement(element: HTMLElement, override?: boolean): ElementController;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

element


</td><td>

HTMLElement


</td><td>

The element to return the controller for.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

override


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Reset the controller even if one has been defined.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ElementController](../fast-element.elementcontroller/)

## Remarks

The specified element must have a [FASTElementDefinition](../fast-element.fastelementdefinition/) registered either through the use of the [customElement()](../fast-element.customelement/) decorator or a call to `FASTElement.define`<!-- -->.
